messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] library mayhem
messages.msgSnippet: Oh gosh, I remember this so well.  I d have a baby in the backpack (he was usually throwing up down my shirt) and the other would be pulling huge chunks of
messages.messageBody:
Oh gosh, I remember this so well. I'd have a baby in the backpack (he
was usually throwing up down my shirt) and the other would be pulling
huge chunks of books off the shelf. Thankfully we have such wonderful
librarians, they understood. They had a talk with one about only taking
one book. It didn't help. :)
But, they would also sit down with them and read as time permitted. We
still are very close to them. They know us by name and temperament.
Hee...Hee....

We are all bookworms, and that's what they want, so I guess they just
have to live with it. :)
Ann
